original_text: My sheep wandered over all the mountains and on every high hill. They were scattered over the whole earth, and no one searched or looked for them.
korean_text: 내 양 떼가 모든 산과 높은 멧부리에마다 유리되었고 내 양 떼가 온 지면에 흩어졌으되 찾고 찾는 자가 없었도다

sentences.original_text: My sheep wandered over all the mountains
sentences.korean_translation: 내 양들은 모든 산에 흩어져 다녔고

sentences.original_text: They were scattered over the whole earth
and no one searched or looked for them
